product_name: Rubber to the Road: 30 More Rides Around Portland - Volume 2
long_description: The second volume of. Author: Otis Rubottom. Softcover; 83 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Bicycle Transportation Alliance; copyright 2003. Each ride features an overview map, distance, highlights, hills and directions to the start. Rides are organized by length: up to 50 mi., 51 to 71 mi. and more than 70 mi.
short_description: The second volume of Rubber to the Road expands upon the first with longer rides, detailed maps and challenging terrain.
